description.text: This spell functions as instant summons, except it can only summon a construct you control. For constructs such as golems that are immune to magic, the value of the specially inscribed sapphire must be at least 5,000 gp. For other constructs, a 1,000 gp sapphire suffices.

sections.Components: V, S, M (a sapphire worth 1,000 or 5,000 gp; see text)
